text: Learn how to talk about lunch (午饭) plans.If you have never tried Kung Pao Chicken (宫保鸡丁), I strongly recommend it. Delicious!小明：小花，你中午去哪里吃饭？小花：去饭店！小明：你去吃什么呢？小花：我吃米饭和宫保鸡丁。小明：我也想吃宫保鸡丁，我们一起去吧。小明：Xiao Hua, where will you go to eat lunch? 小花：To a restaurant! 小明：What are you going to eat? 小花：I will eat rice and Kung Pao Chicken. 小明：I also want to eat Kung Pao Chicken, let’s go together.1 – 小花今天中午去哪里吃饭？a. 饭店b. 学校c. 宿舍d. 公司2 – 小明也想吃什么？a. 米饭b. 宫保鸡丁c. 苹果d. 面条1. a2. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
